Courses.Name: SCIENCE 3377B - PROJECT MGMNT FOR THE SCIENCES
Description: Fundamental techniques, theories, and tools for managing successful projects in the Sciences. Project management standards and life cycles; resourcing, scheduling and estimating techniques for project management; project management organizational concerns, including project economic analysis, human resources, proposal development, risk management, funding models, procurement, and strategic alignments.

Notes: REQUISITES: Prerequisite(s): Registration in third or fourth year of any module in the Faculty of Science or Schulich School of Medicine & Dentistry.
